jokes.question: Why don't scientists trust atoms?
Did you hear about the mathematician who's afraid of negative numbers?
jokes.answer: He'll stop at nothing to avoid them!

jokes.question: Why don't skeletons fight each other?

jokes.answer: Because he was outstanding in his field!

jokes.question: How do you catch a squirrel?
jokes.answer: Climb a tree and act like a nut!

jokes.question: What did one wall say to the other wall?
jokes.answer: I'll meet you at the corner!

jokes.question: Why couldn't the bicycle stand up by itself?
How do you organize a space party?
Why did the tomato turn red?
jokes.answer: Because it saw the salad dressing!

jokes.question: What do you call a bear with no teeth?
Did you hear about the cheese factory that exploded in France?
jokes.answer: There was nothing left but de Brie!

jokes.question: Why don't eggs tell jokes?
What did the baby corn say to its mom?

What kind of shoes do ninjas wear?
Why did the golfer bring two pairs of pants?
jokes.answer: In case he got a hole in one!

jokes.question: What did one hat say to the other hat?
jokes.answer: You stay here, I'll go on ahead!

jokes.question: Why are spiders great volleyball players?
jokes.answer: Because they have great sets of legs!

jokes.question: What gets wetter the more it dries?
What did one plate say to the other plate?
Why don't you ever see hippopotamus hiding in trees?
jokes.answer: Because they're very good at it!

jokes.question: How do you make a tissue dance?
jokes.answer: You put a little boogie in it!

jokes.question: Why was the computer cold?
Why did the teddy bear say 'No' to dessert?

jokes.answer: I think I'm coming down with something!

jokes.question: Why did the bicycle fall over?

jokes.answer: Nothing, but it let out a little wine!
